short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to acquire refrigerated dessert cases for the Valcartier site in Quebec. The contract will be awarded based on the bidder's proposal.
description: This request for proposal is for the acquisition of refrigerated dessert cases by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the Valcartier site in Quebec, Canada. The contract will be awarded based on the bidder's proposal, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement in the solicitation.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Refrigerated Dessert Cases**

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

| **Field** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Tender Reference | W6856-24V301 | |
| Solicitation Number | WS4494297670 |  |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-05-14T14:00:00 |  |
| Government Tender Status | Expired |  |

### Bidder Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (DDP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Procurement Details

* **Goods or Services**: Refrigerated dessert cases with delivery
* **Location**: Valcartier, Quebec, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Name**: Joanne Godin, 2 (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents

* [Click Here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19430062?extsite=MTk0MzAwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for the related government tender notice.

Below is the remaining body:

### Key Details

The Request for Proposal is made by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, for the acquisition of refrigerated dessert cases, including delivery. The goods and services will be used in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada.

### Procurement Category

**Isoelonnmtp category:** Goods
### Regions of Opportunity

None
### Business Requirement IDs

None
### Primary Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
### User Fees or Taxes

None
